entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Follow up on failing WASM AOT tests #31491
  • GenAPI filters out generic interfaces for implementations #31484

Closed

  • `--self-contained false` is ignored when `PublishNativeAot=true` #31477
  • Unable to run SDK on Docker with file size limit set #31457

PullRequests

Created

  • Wasm SDK code owners #31489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Using built-in package for package reference to `Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers` #31488
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix `publish --self-contained` for Blazor builds. #30700
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [ASP.NET Core] Updates the license headers for Razor files #20699
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Split WebAssembly SDK from Blazor SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Add AfterPublish target to ClickOnce target dependencies #31313
    Area-Infrastructure
  • First pass at source build pre-built detection #31341
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update off-by-default analyzers to account for rename #31460
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2145921 #31394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • Enable containers publishing #31432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
